definitions.definition: Eating away; having the power of gradually wearing , hanging, or destroying the texture or substance of a body; as the corrosive action of an acid.
Having the quality of fretting or vexing .

main_definition: Eating away; having the power of gradually wearing , hanging, or destroying the texture or substance of a body; as the corrosive action of an acid.
secondary_definitions: Having the quality of fretting or vexing .
